commentThread.commentText: The only one that I don't understand is the one where he says pregnancy is inconvenient for a business. Why would people get offended by that? A business is always 100% better off while not having to accommodate for pregnant employees.

replies.commentText: Well, you should be thankful that your own Mother decided to have you and that she didn't see her pregnancy as an obstacle to her career advancement. If you don't "accommodate" and give support when women (and MEN) decide to procreate you will not have any future PEOPLE on the planet. But family life doesn't matter right? With attitudes like yours it's no wonder so many are pressured to abort. & Trump is against abortion... but he is also against lifting a finger to help care for his own children. Some father he must have been.

You attempt to make me feel guilty while not addressing my statement. I said pregnancy is inconvenient for a business, and you gave no counter-arguments to that assertion. Obviously, we have to pro-create, but from a business perspective, of course it's more advantageous to not have to deal with paid maternity leave. I'm not saying that the method of thinking is ethical, but what I can for certain tell you is that pregnancy is always economically bad for a business because all it does is suck money out of a company on account of one person's child.

Research shows the opposite, that paid Maternity (& Paternity) leave is beneficial. http://www.businessinsider.com/scientific-proof-paid-parental-leave-is-good-for-everyone & http://stateofopportunity.michiganradio.org/post/three-reasons-why-paid-paternity-leave-should-be-more-common
 - Plus Moms are more likely to RETURN to work after taking PAID maternity leave.
Those aren't scientific studies. Nice try. Of course businesses don't want to waste money paying someone who's not even in the office. Not to mention, they'd waste time and resources training her.

replies.commentText: Oh yeah, just like how people say violent movies and video games make people violent. Let's ban them all! And no rape jokes either. Dark humor of any sort should be BANNED!

@Fernando Wong My wife and I were always very involved in our kids lives and school activities and in a local Christian ministry for at-risk youth.  In my opinion, for children and teens?  Yes, I do believe kids can be desensitized to violence through things like video games.  But for adults,  your personality is already formed.  As a firefighter and hockey player, I know that men especially need an outlet for aggression.  Some dudes go to the gym or run marathons, or work super hard jobs and some guys kick ass in a cyber world and still lead perfectly normal lives.  But I'd rather see kids getting outside or cutting lawns or playing sports to use up that energy than running over make-believe hookers in a video game.  Far too often I've seen violent video games used as a babysitter.  That's just a recipe for disaster.  Maybe not all kids will be adversely affected, but enough will be to create problems.  Personally I love dark, dirty  comedy, but I just don't find joking about rape funny.  I also don't find 9/11 jokes or pedophilia jokes or animal abuse jokes funny either.  Guess I'm a real prude, eh?
Rico Suave So you have a different sense of humor than other people. Who would've guessed? Maybe Trump just finds certain things funny that you don't.
Maybe that's true.  I'd never let anybody call my daughter a "Piece of Ass" to my face and walk away with all his teeth, that's for damn sure.
Rico Suave Well then you have anger issues. Physically assaulting someone over words is illegal and you would be charged for it.

Rico Suave Ok let's say you bunch the guy. He doesn't go down. He pulls out a knife. Is friends jump in. Now what? You're now putting your daughter's life in danger when you could've just walked away. Why not just walk away? It would hurt your fragile ego?

No, troll. This was a radio discussion between two associates, with one asking if it was "okay" with a dad, Donald to call Ivanka "a piece of ass." Donald said it was fine! THAT is the issue. NO man I know would tell another man that was ok and it would be pretty clear from just a quick look that the other guy better find another way of expressing himself. This wasn't a cat-call in some dark alley! Grow up and stop twisting things to make Trump and rape comments/jokes seem acceptable. Assholes like you are the reason Trump got elected. Either you're some uneducated, jealous moron who believed obviously false crap like the Clintons worshiped Lucifer and performed alien blood rituals OR you're some weak, sniveling little lazy sucking-off-the-teat socialist who make normal Democrats look bad. I doubt you've ever held a real job for more than a few months. Do you give waitresses a hard time too? You remind me of the kind of guy that bitches at the firefighters for leaving their child's new shoes inside the burning house they got saved from, even though the firefighter went back in and risked his life to save the family's pets. Mitt Romney is a very diplomatic person, but I doubt he would ever say it was "fine" to describe his own daughter that way or just sit by and let it happen. I'm very sorry if you were raised where things like that are ok. And I'm sorry for your daughter, if you have one, that her father is not a stronger man. Go back and play your video games. Let the rest of us do the heavy lifting while you sit and critique.

Rico Suave LOL what got your panties in a bunch, faggot? Yeah in the context of the show, it was totally fine for Howard Stern to call Ivanka a hot piece of ass. That's what his show and personality are like. You're a soft fuck who gets offended over everything and resorts to violence when someone offends you. Lol pathetic little man.

FERNANDO: LOL I must have hit a yuuuuge nerve on your never holding down a job! Educated people don't use the word faggot these days, loser. You sound like you're a kid, so I'm done here. But one last thing: Man, get a job, it will make you feel so much better about yourself and give you less time to fret about the size of your micro penis. I bet your hands are small too.
